flawed_nl_solution:
Toby has 600.0 friends because 33 / 0.55 = <<33/0.55=600.0>>600.0
45% of his friends are girls because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=45>>45
He has 270.0 friends who are girls because 600.0 x 0.45 = <<270.0=270.0>>270.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 59.99999999999999, not 600.0. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
